javadoc.text: * The root class from which all events occurring while running an{@link IterationManager} should be derived.
* The number of iterations performed so far.
* Creates a new instance of this class.
javadoc.param: source the iterative algorithm on which the event initially * occurred
iterations the number of iterations performed at the time{@code this} event is created

javadoc.text: * Returns the number of iterations performed at the time {@code this} event * is created.
